d.f: ￹￺mud used to plaster the walls of a house or the mouth of an earthen vessel￻用水泥砌牆或堵塞或封住陶器的口

e: ￹`Ma~`sadit~ `to~ `amoto~ `ko~ `paenan~ `ato~ `cafeng~ `no~ `loma'~ `niyam~.￺The floor and walls of our house have been plastered with cement.￻我們家的圍牆和地板已經用水泥舖成了
d.f: ￹￺cement is now used for this purpose￻水泥現在已被用於這個目的
